This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: West to North reflective object in leipers fork, tn approximately 9:30 am on may 10th 2012
divs: sighting details9:30 am 5\10\2012 i was driving north thru liepers fork, tn. on my way to work, when a reflective object caught my eye just west of me over the natchez trace parkway. the sun-glare showed that it was slightly banking possibly from an eastward direction to north. i thought it ws a plane at first, but it was too low in the sky. then i realized i couldn't see wings. i decided to try and speed up to get a better look and saw that it too was speeding up slowly then moved to a high rate of speed over the school. as a tall tree passed my view for half a second(i was driving 55 mph) the object was gone. there was no clouds in the sky and no obstructions. this is my first daytime sighting. from the time i saw the object to the time it vanished was approximately 15-20 seconds. i was perplexed at first, then just intrigued and wanting to see better detail, by the time the sighting was over i was in awe and excited. it definitely solidified the existence of these unknown objects for me.
